description: Link or unlink a prexisting functionapp with a static webapp. Also known as "Bring your own Functions.".

commands.name: az staticwebapp functions link
commands.summary: Link an Azure Function to a static webapp. Also known as "Bring your own Functions." Only one Azure Functions app is available to a single static web app. Static webapp SKU must be "Standard" or "Dedicated".
examples: az staticwebapp functions link -n MyStaticAppName -g MyResourceGroup --function-resource-id "/subscriptions/<subscription-id>/resourceGroups/<resource-group>/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/<function-name>"

commands.name: az staticwebapp functions show
commands.summary: Show details on the Azure Function linked to a static webapp.
examples: az staticwebapp functions show -n MyStaticAppName -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az staticwebapp functions unlink
commands.summary: Unlink an Azure Function from a static webapp.
examples: az staticwebapp functions unlink -n MyStaticAppName -g MyResourceGroup
